meanings.definition: The cardinal number that is the sum of two and one.
meanings.sent1: I have three apples in my bag.
meanings.sent2: The traffic light changed after counting to three.
meanings.sent3: The three little kittens lost their mittens.
meanings.sent4: The three musketeers fought bravely together.
meanings.sent5: She wore three colorful bracelets on her wrist.

meanings.definition: A group or set of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: They formed a team of three for the relay race.
meanings.sent2: The three friends went to the park together.
meanings.sent3: The three wise men brought gifts to the baby.
meanings.sent4: The three primary colors are red, blue, and yellow.
meanings.sent5: The three little pigs built different houses.

meanings.sent1: She bought three new books at the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The family adopted three adorable kittens.
meanings.sent3: The three happy children played in the park.
meanings.sent4: The three bright stars shone in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: He wore three mismatched socks to school.
